Uses of Package
org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser

  • Packages that use org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.activities.wsdl
    Contains the activity classes required to interact with a WSDL based web-service.
    org.apache.taverna.activities.wsdl.xmlsplitter  
    org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser
    Contains classes required to parse a WSDL to discover and describe the operations and their input and output data structures.
    These classes are derived heavily from the original parsing classes from the Taverna 1 WSDLBasedProcessor and have been refactored
    to remove references to to Taverna 1
    org.apache.taverna.wsdl.soap
    Contains classes required to invoke an endpoint for a SOAP based web-service described by a WSDL.
    These classes are derived heavily from the original parsing classes from the Taverna 1 WSDLBasedProcessor and have been refactored
    to remove references to to Taverna 1
    org.apache.taverna.wsdl.xmlsplitter  
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser used by org.apache.taverna.activities.wsdl 
    Class and Description
    TypeDescriptor
    Base class for all descriptors for type
    UnknownOperationException
    Exception thrown when a given service operation name cannot be found for that WSDL
    WSDLParser
    A Parser for processing WSDL files to determine information about available services and the required types needed to invoke that particular service.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser used by org.apache.taverna.activities.wsdl.xmlsplitter 
    Class and Description
    TypeDescriptor
    Base class for all descriptors for type
    UnknownOperationException
    Exception thrown when a given service operation name cannot be found for that WSDL

    Class and Description

    TypeDescriptor
    Base class for all descriptors for type
    UnknownOperationException
    Exception thrown when a given service operation name cannot be found for that WSDL
    WSDL11Parser
    This is an WSDL 1.1 / Xml Schema 1.0 parser based on WSDL4j and Apache XML Schema 2.0 libraries
    WSDL20Parser 
    WSRF_RLOperation 
    WSRF_RPOperation 
    WSRF_Version
